Hello every one,these are a few tips when making a plane,I hope I helped you and have fun.

1.**IMPORTANT!!!!**

**The center of lift NEEDS to be slightly behind the center of mass,otherwise the plane wont take off AT ALL**

2.If you are making jets,make it **SMALL** as a jet with large wings is not a jet at all.

3.Patience is a virtue as you can spend a lot of time making a plane.

4.If you are using BD Armory,fly the plane BEFORE weaponizing it,as this makes sure that the plane works well.

5.Enjoy making it.If you dont wanna,dont.The most important thing about games is when you like playing it or not.

Thats all for my tips,comment if you have any tips that I might add ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hello every one,these are a few tips when making a plane,I hope I helped you and have fun.
> 1.**IMPORTANT!!!!**
> 
> **The center of lift NEEDS to be slightly behind the center of mass,otherwise the plane wont take off AT ALL**

More importantly, it needs to STAY behind the centre of mass as your fuel drains and weight shifts during flight, or it will become uncontrollable.

> 
> 2.If you are making jets,make it **SMALL** as a jet with large wings is not a jet at all.

Ahem.

If it has jet engines, it's a jet.
